ecopedia.summary: Using a hammer or a crane, citizens can create buildings for homes and industry.
ecopedia.section: After collecting some basic raw materials, building is one of the first things a citizen will do to establish themselves in the world.

Buildings are divided up into [Rooms] and serve a variety of purposes.
Some of these uses include:
- Making a home filled with furniture to gain bonus [Experience] from housing
- Providing a space for [Crafting] stations to function
- Housing the various [Civic Objects|Civic Object Component] neccesary to establish a government

When carrying a building material, the hammer is able to switch between different block shapes and building patterns.
Citizens build their first homes using a [StoneHammerItem], but as technology progresses increasingly better building tools become available that consume less calorie when used.
Large-scale construction projects can be quickly completed with the use of a [CraneItem], but at the cost of creating [Pollution].
